text: __NOTOC__ Year 127 (CXXVII) was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Emperor Hadrian returns to Rome after a seven-year trip to the Roman provinces. * Hadrian decides that Christians will not be put to death without a trial. ==== India ==== * Kanishka I starts to rule in Kushan Empire (approximate date). === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * The philosopher Carpocrates says ownership of private property is un-Christian. == Births == * Zheng Xuan, Chinese philosopher (d. 200) == Deaths == * Plutarch, Greek historian
